title: Describe power of test for patient disease

content.description:
A doctor uses a new diagnostic test to indicate whether a patient has a certain disease. The doctor will prescribe medication for the patient if the doctor believes the patient has the disease, as indicated by the diagnostic test. The situation is similar to using a null hypothesis and an alternative hypothesis to decide whether to prescribe the medication. The hypotheses can be stated as follows.

<math> <semantics> <mrow> <msub> <mtext>H</mtext> <mtext>a</mtext> </msub> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaaeisamaaBaaaleaacaqGHbaabeaaaaa@37CF@</annotation> </semantics> </math> : The patient has the disease.
content.question: Which of the following best describes the power of the test?

choices.label: The probability that the new test is better than an older test to indicate whether a patient has the disease
The probability that the new test indicates the disease in a patient who has the disease
The probability that the new test indicates the disease in a patient who does not have the disease
The probability that the new test does not indicate the disease in a patient who has the disease
The probability that the new test does not indicate the disease in a patient who does not have the disease

content.answer: The probability that the new test indicates the disease in a patient who has the disease
